SELECT '100019956' AS MBR_ID -- 회원ID ,'823362' AS UNITED_ID -- UNITED_ID
,'sugapr**@nate.com' AS EMAIL_ADDR -- 이메일 주소
,'sugapro@nate.com' AS EMAIL_ADDR
,'2' AS EMAIL_ADDR_DUP_YN -- 이메일주소중복여부 ,'2015-10-22' AS MART_UPD_DTTM -- 마트변경일시 FROM dual

SELECT A.MBR_ID AS MBR_ID -- 회원ID ,C.UNITED_ID AS UNITED_ID -- UNITED_ID
,DECODE(B.EMAIL_ADDR,NULL,B.EMAIL_ADDR,SUBSTR(regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1),1,LENGTH(regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 1))-2)||'**@'||regexp_substr(B.EMAIL_ADDR, '[^@]+', 1, 2)) AS EMAIL_ADDR -- 이메일주소
,B.EMAIL_ADDR AS EMAIL_ADDR
,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MIN(A.CUST_REG_DT), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MIN_CUST_REG_DT -- 최초일자 ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(A.CUST_REG_DT), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MAX_CUST_REG_DT -- 최종일자 FROM INTGUSER.DW_MKTNG_AGRMT_MGMT_HST A JOIN INTGUSER.DW_MKTNG_AGRMT_HST B ON (A.CUST_REG_DT = B.CUST_REG_DT AND A.REG_NO = B.REG_NO AND A.REP_REG_NO = B.REP_REG_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN INTGUSER.MART_INDIV_MBR_MST C ON A.MBR_ID = C.MBR_ID
WHERE B.EMAIL_ADDR = #{emailAddr}
WHERE B.EMAIL_ADDR LIKE #{emailAddr}
GROUP BY A.MBR_ID -- 회원ID ,C.UNITED_ID -- UNITED_ID ,B.EMAIL_ADDR -- 이메일 주소
